subject: iPodSweepstakes Alert: Special Offers Enclosed
body:
Win A Free iPod From ipodsweepstakes.com





























Ocean Spray and 5 Pod Points
Just for entering your email address you will get 5 Pod Points, but you could also get 2 Half-Gallons of Ocean Spray! 

Get 5 Pod Points just for entering your email address!
 Click Here. 


5 Pod Points





























Free Venus Razor and 4 Pod Points
Just fill out your shipping address and they will send you a FREE Venus Razor!

Get 4 Pod Points when you request a Venus Razor for FREE!
 Click Here. 


4 Pod Points





























Free Degree Information and 20 Pod Points
Earn your degree from the comfort of your own home with a leading university.  

Get 20 Pod Points just for requesting FREE information about getting a degree!  
 Click Here. 


20 Pod Points





























Free Information and 15 Pod Points
Earn a college degree online that focuses on a technical education through distance learning.

Get 15 Pod Points just for requesting FREE information about getting a degree!  
 Click Here. 


15 Pod Points













Hurry, These Offers ExpireFriday, July 6, 2007!

      You have received this message as part of your iPodSweepstakes.com membership. You agreed to receive these offers by email on
      8/16/2006 12:22:19 PM.  If this appears to be in error, or if you no longer wish to receive email from us,
      click here or email Helpdesk@iPodSweepstakes.com and type "unsubscribe" in the subject line, or write to us at 945 Clint Moore Road, Boca Raton, FL 33487.
